column2: The  construction  may  be  utilized  for  the  purpose of community and  recreation  of the
allottees of plans PI  (a) and PI  (b).
The petitioner is granted the relief as  prayed in  paragraphs (c)  and  (d)  of the  prayer of
the petition. Relief sought in  paragraph (e)  is  refused.
Application of the petitioner is  partly allowed.
